titles.title: To suspend until December 31, 2012, the duty on ethylene-norbornene copolymer.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 12/13/2007--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2012, the duty on ethylene-norbornene copolymer (CAS No. 26007-43-2).
